mapper.select: select CollectionField_ID,Article_ID,Classification_ID,ArticleTitle,ArticleAbstract,ArticleText, (select count(1) from m_mycollection cc where cc.Article_ID=a.Article_ID ) collcnt, ArticleAuthor,DATE_FORMAT(Releasetime,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') Releasetime, ArticleURL,ArticleKeyWord,PictureStoragePath, Website_ID, (select b.WebsiteName from m_websiteinfo b where a.Website_ID=b.Website_ID) WebsiteName, SourceDivision,EmotionDivision, ( select count(1) from a_articlebasicinfo b where a.SimilarArticlesNo=b.SimilarArticlesNo and a.Article_ID!=b.Article_ID and Article_ID not in (select Article_ID from A_UserDeleteArticleInfo where User_ID=#{userid}) ) sim_cnt, IF(a.Article_ID in (SELECT k.Article_ID FROM a_userearlywarningarticleinfo as k where k.User_ID=#{userid}),"yes","no") isearlywarning from a_articlebasicinfo a where a.Article_ID=#{article_id} and not exists (select 1 from a_userdeletearticleinfo b where a.Article_ID=b.Article_ID)

select DATE_FORMAT(a.Releasetime,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') Releasetime,a.ArticleURL,b.WebsiteName from a_articlebasicinfo a,m_websiteinfo b where a.Website_ID=b.Website_ID and a.ArticleTitle=(select c.ArticleTitle from a_articlebasicinfo c where c.Article_ID=#{article_id} ) and not exists (select 1 from a_userdeletearticleinfo b where a.Article_ID=b.Article_ID) order by a.Releasetime desc

select a.Article_ID,a.ArticleTitle,a.ArticleURL from a_articlebasicinfo a where a.SimilarArticlesNo= (select b.SimilarArticlesNo from a_articlebasicinfo b where b.Article_ID=#{Article_ID}) and a.Article_ID!=#{Article_ID} and not exists (select 1 from A_UserDeleteArticleInfo b where b.Article_ID=a.Article_ID and b.User_ID=#{userid}) order by Releasetime desc
